text: Excellent food,clean place so glad so many good places popping up out here,highly recommended,but they do work on Jamaican time so be patient,worth the wait

Wonderful place! The food is delicious, authentic, good portions, and reasonable prices, and the service is excellent. The music and lifting make for a fun atmosphere, and great location by lots of shopping. Be sure to try the doubles- they are incredible!

What a nice restaurant!  Beautiful and clean decor. Service was prompt, helpful and courteous. The food was all well cooked, delicious and authentic. Ordered chicken roti, fried chicken, calamari,  and jerk chicken salad. Very nice portion sizes. Definitely will return soon
